name: HuGO
tagline: Human Group Onsight - a tool to visualize family constellations
body:
### Welcome to the HuGO project.
Family Constellations (a subset application of Systemic Constellations) is an experiential process that aims to release and resolve profound tensions within and between people. Bert Hellinger, a German philosopher-psychologist is considered the founder of Family Constellations in their modern form.
Look at [Wikipedia: Family Constellations](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family_Constellations) for more informations. 

[Christian Borck](http://www.cborck.de/) is a german therapist, who uses this method for several years now.
The Idea of this project came at such a family constellation meeting.
The goal is to have a tool to visualize family constellations based on Html5, CSS3, Javascript and maybe PHP5.

### License
HuGO is published under [GPLv3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0-standalone.html).

### Local Usage
You can download the tarball or zipfile above, unpack it and open the file src/hugo.html 
with your local browser.

### Usage on your homepage
Since HuGO is developed under GPLv3 you are free to use, change or redistribute it under the terms of this license.
